## grayscale variable

Returns transformation matrix which computes luminance of user color (optionally with custom coefficients). Does NOT modify alpha channel.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
grayscale: (offset?: number, [r, g, b]?: number[]) => ColorMatrix
```

## Remarks

See [RGB\_LUMINANCE](./color.rgb_luminance.md) for default coefficients
